comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Colonel William Jay was a prominant horseman, coachman and proponent of horse racing. He died on March 28, 1915 and his obituary may be read here: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E1D81238E633A...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an article on them in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Jay_(Colonel) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lida_Fleitmann_Bloodgood I have added addition information there, and added this photo.

comment.author: 75421381@N00
comment._content: It looks like there is a date both in the top right hand corner and along the right-hand border. The one in the corner looks like it says 3/29/15 and the one on the side, almost transparent, looks like it says 3/29/12. Perhaps it is a wake or something after his death in '15?
